appetizers.name: Hot Wings
appetizers.description: Classic hot wings, hot sauce can be subbed out for medium or mild sauce.

appetizers.name: JSON Potstickers
appetizers.description: Our delicious potstickers are made from scratch here at the deli with the freshest ingredients.

cold sandwiches.name: Pesto Turkey
cold sandwiches.description: The pesto turkey cold sam is made from fresh ingredients and is quite scrumptious.

cold sandwiches.name: Red Pepper Roast Beef
cold sandwiches.description: The Roast Beef is our best selling sandwich. It's absolutely delicious.

hot sandwiches.name: Reuben
hot sandwiches.description: The classic reuben is grilled to perfection with the finest ingredients

hot sandwiches.name: Customizable Burger
hot sandwiches.description: Our Burger is the best in town, cooked to perfection, with delicious ingredients and fully customizable.

desserts.name: Mint Chocolate Mousse
desserts.description: Our mousse is made from scratch in house, with the perfect amount of mint added.

desserts.name: Mochi
desserts.description: Delicious mochi ice cream (ice cream wrapped in a rice paste) in either green tea or chocolate flavor.

drinks.name: Coffee
drinks.description: Coffee made from locally roasted beans.

drinks.name: JSON shake
drinks.description: This delicious, nutty smoothie has lots of fiber and seeds to help your gut health.
